conclusion: Violation of Art. 6-1+6-3-b;No violation of Art. 10;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF HADJIANASTASIOU v. GREECE - [Russian Translation]
